name: S3 Image Gallery
description: Harnessing Amazon S3 to create galleries
overview:
S3 Image Gallery ( www.s3ig.com ) allows you to create photo and image galleries from your files on Amazon S3 and edit them.

Using the Amazon S3 service, S3 Image Gallery harnesses the power to share photos and other images already uploaded to Amazon S3 in a slideshow or light box gallery format. Photo owners can easily create galleries in a chosen style with automatically generated thumbnails.

As the gallery owner you choose who is able to see your gallery. You may not want your images on a public service like Picassa or Flickr or want Google crawling your private images but still want friends and colleagues to be able to see your images.

The S3 Image Gallery will maintain a description for each image, also stored on S3, and as the gallery owner you are able to edit the descriptions.

S3 Image Gallery integrates with Pixlr the leading on-line image editing service so you are able to customize your images all within your browser.
